Articles.Content:
so i have this new macbook Pro

and i can not launch it will not leave the VAB, SPH

i can build like mad but no luck in getting to the launch pad.

iv set the Physics delta time to .03, what more can i do?

Processor 2.3 GHz Intel Core i7

Memory 4 GB 1600 MHz DDR3

Graphics NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 512 MB

Software OS X 10.8.3 (12D78)

What exactly happens when you hit the Launch button? If you are in the Space Center view and click on the runway or launchpad, does it give you the option to launch a vessel? If so, what happens next?

What exactly happens when you hit the Launch button? If you are in the Space Center view and click on the runway or launchpad, does it give you the option to launch a vessel? If so, what happens next?

im still in the vab,sph it just freezes when i try to launch iv tried a 5 pc ship to 100 pc ship and the same thing happens

Edited May 16, 2013 by MissMolly
How long do you wait after pressing 'launch'? My laptop takes a short while to get to the launch pad.

How long do you wait after pressing 'launch'? My laptop takes a short while to get to the launch pad.

Iv waited up to 20 mins last night then said screw it and shut it down

20 mins is too long. I wait maybe 10 secs to get to launch pad and another 20 secs for the parts to 'settle'

I dont know what the problem could be, but i would reduce the graphic settings from the menu to maybe help it run better.

Best of luck!!
